project

Summary
Almost everything is managed within the context of a project. For example, each project manages its own list of customers and sites.


Fields
Name Type Attributes Description
auditLogTitle  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		This is used a the title in auditLogs. This should NEVER be null.  
autoSiteNumberEnabled  boolean required
  		Determine if site numbers should be automatically generated. Site numbers are generated by combining the site number prefix with a padded numeric value. Although the generated numbers will generally start at 1 and increment, the number are not guaranteed to be contiguous. In other words, there may be gaps. E.g.: S001, S002, S004 (S003 was skipped).  
autoSiteNumberPadding  integerMin0 required
  		The number of digits to pad each number. For example, a value of 3 will generate numbers like 001, 002, 003.  
autoSiteNumberPrefix  text5
max length: 5
allows printable 		  The prefix to add at the beginning of auto-generated site numbers. Although not required, it is recommend to include a non-numeric prefix such as "S" in order to improve compatibility with external tools such as spreadsheets.  
businessDays  dayFrequency   The nominal business days (e.g.: Monday through Friday). This may be displayed to customers.  
businessEndTime  time required
  		The nominal end of business hours. This may be displayed to customers.  
businessStartTime  time required
  		The nominal start of business hours. This may be displayed to customers.  
code  projectCode
max length: 5
allows letters
allows digits 		required
  		The unique code that identifies this project.  
companyName  name
max length: 50
allows printable 		required
  		The name of the company responsible for this project. This may be used on various documents such as emails and pick lists.  
createdLocalDate  date abstract
  		The created date based on the user's local timezone.  
createdLocalTime  time abstract
  		The created time of day based on the user's local timezone.  
createdLocalTs  timestamp abstract
  		The created timestamp converted to the user's local timezone.  
createdLocalTsMessage  text100
max length: 100
allows printable 		abstract
  		The created timestamp converted to the user's local timezone, and formatted as a string that includes the timezone code.  
createdUtcTs  timestamp required
audit disabled   		The time this record was originally created.  
description  memo
max length: 1000
allows printable
allows whitespace 		  A short description of this project.  
domainSubtitle  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		The subtitle commonly used for rows in a list. This MAY be null, if there is not subtitle.  
domainTitle  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		The title commonly used for rows in a list or dropdown field. This should NEVER be null.  
enabled  boolean required
  		Disable to hide this on various screens.  
enabledStatus  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		Disable to hide this on various screens.  
lockVersion  lockVersion required
audit disabled   		This is used to coordinate optimistic locking in the database. This is usually not displayed.  
name  name
max length: 50
allows printable 		required
  		The display name.  
nextAutoSiteNumber  integer required
  		The next automatic site number to be assigned. The current prefix is added dynamically as needed.  
sendEmailFrom  email
max length: 50
allows letters
allows digits
allows symbols 		required
  		The email address that all project emails will be sent FROM.  
timeZoneCode  timeZoneCode
max length: 40
allows printable 		required
  		The primary time zone associated with this project.  
timeZoneName  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		The time zone associated with the depot's location.  
uid  uid
max length: 30
allows printable 		primary key
required
  		The global unique key. This is a large hex-encoded number, and is usually not displayed to users. This is currently NOT a standard format, but is instead a format that we use internally.  
updatedLocalDate  date abstract
  		The updated date based on the user's local timezone.  
updatedLocalTime  time abstract
  		The updated time of day based on the user's local timezone.  
updatedLocalTs  timestamp abstract
  		The updated timestamp converted to the user's local timezone.  
updatedLocalTsMessage  text100
max length: 100
allows printable 		abstract
  		The updated timestamp converted to the user's local timezone, and formatted as a string that includes the timezone code.  
updatedUtcTs  timestamp required
audit disabled   		The time this record was last updated.  


Associations
Name Type Attributes Description
createdBy  user audit disabled   The user that originally created this record, if known.  
defaultPriority  priority required
  		This is default priority for the project.  
supervisor  user required
  		The project's primary supervisor.  
supportContact  projectContact   The contact to be used for support notifications and as a general mailingl list.  
tenant  tenant required
  		The tenant that owns this project.  
updatedBy  user audit disabled   The user that last updated this record, if known.  


Collections
Name Type Comment
blurbs  List
KmCollection<MyBlurb> 		The message blurbs for this project.  
contacts  List
KmCollection<MyProjectContact> 		These contacts are primarily used for notifications.  
customers  List
KmCollection<MyCustomer> 		The customers.  
emailTemplates  List
KmCollection<MyEmailTemplate> 		The email templates.  
holidays  List
KmCollection<MyHoliday> 		The holidays defined by this project.  
members  List
KmCollection<MyMember> 		The members (users) assigned to this project.  
vendors  List
KmCollection<MyVendor> 		The vendors for this project.
